Desc.entry: A voluntary sector organisation based in Sheffield that works with refugees and asylum seekers, providing impartial advice, information and practical support to help them access education, mentoring, volunteering and employment opportunities. Acts as a central information point about the availability of English classes across Sheffield. Sets up volunteer work placements, employment familiarisation initiatives, support groups and other appropriate mentoring activities for refugees from professional backgrounds. Self or any referral.
